recipe.title: Roasted Cherry Tomato Caprese
ingredients: 8 ounces fresh buffalo or cow mozzarella (about 1 ball), room temperature, torn into large pieces
Country-style bread, brushed with oil, toasted in oven (for serving)
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Toss tomatoes, thyme, garlic, and oil on a rimmed baking sheet to coat and season lightly with kosher salt. Spread out in a single layer and roast until tomatoes are bursting and lightly browned, 40–45 minutes; let cool. Arrange mozzarella on a platter and spoon warm tomato mixture with juices over; sprinkle with sea salt. Serve with olive-oil-toasted bread for soaking up all those extra juices.
